name: stoked-sparksurfer
caption: Stoked Sparksurfer

effect.short: Has a 100% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic:paralysis} the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 100% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic:paralyze} the target.

flavorText:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
